body_html: Using the underlying ops of index_to_string_table_from_file (tf.contrib.lookup.HashTable with tf.contrib.lookup.TextFileStringTableInitializer) which can take the file path as a tf.tensor seems to solve the issue of loading the file from the saved_model assets folder, so I assume the proposed patch from @facaiy for input validation will work for my issue.
body_text: Using the underlying ops of index_to_string_table_from_file (tf.contrib.lookup.HashTable  with tf.contrib.lookup.TextFileStringTableInitializer) which can take the file path as a tf.tensor seems to solve the issue of loading the file from the saved_model assets folder, so I assume the proposed patch from @facaiy for input validation will work for my issue.
body: Using the underlying ops of `index_to_string_table_from_file` (`tf.contrib.lookup.HashTable ` with `tf.contrib.lookup.TextFileStringTableInitializer`) which can take the file path as a tf.tensor seems to solve the issue of loading the file from the saved_model assets folder, so I assume the proposed patch from @facaiy for input validation will work for my issue.
